description: This file implements the ChatWindow React component, which is a high-level layout component for chat functionality. It loads messages from the store, displays them via MessageList, and handles sending new messages through ChatInput. It manages fetching messages on mount and dispatching send message actions.

methods.name: handleSend
methods.description: Handles sending a message by extracting text and tags from the editor element, creating a payload with UUID, timestamp, and sender info, then dispatching the sendMessage action and handling errors.
